phrase.text: Hey, stalker. How do you feel about this place? Having fun?
Slug didn't tell you that the protection system turns on and the exit closes whenever someone walks in here. Had to save you there. Heh.
I know many interesting things. I'd tell you. But for that, you'll need to work a bit.
Well, tell me something at least! Don't you know the way to the northern part of the Zone?
I know everything myself! I'll do just fine without your help!
I've told you that I won't share anything with you. And that's what interests me the most.
